query:
UPDATE scan_number
            SET last_number = number + 1
            FROM (
                SELECT beamline.id AS bl_id, beamline.name AS name, scan_number.last_number AS number
                FROM scan_number
                    JOIN beamline ON scan_number.beamline = beamline.id
                WHERE beamline.name=?
            )
            WHERE beamline = bl_id
            RETURNING last_number
